name: Knee Deep In The Doot
description:
Controls

  • W, A, S, D = move
  • E, Q = cycle weapon
  • Left click = fire
  • Space = interact

The worst scenario has happened: the skeletal bards have risen from the dead! To make matters worse they're angry, they're bony, and they're ready to doot. Put them back in the ground before it's too late!

Credits

Pixelboy

SoundBible for all SFX:

https://soundbible.com/2095-Mossberg-500-Pump-Shotgun.html

https://soundbible.com/1930-Clean-Paper-Rip.html

https://soundbible.com/1996-Shotgun-Reload-Old.html

https://soundbible.com/2062-Metal-Gong-1.html

Sammi Belaloui for the low poly skeleton model

Mixamo for all skeleton movement and attack animations

Kenney.nl for weapon models
